actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: A bill to provide for the conveyance of certain surplus property of the National Aeronautics and Space Administration located in Erie County, Ohio, to the individuals from whom the United States acquired the property.

summary.text: Provides for the conveyance of certain surplus property of the National Aeronautics and Space Administration located in Erie County, Ohio, to certain individuals from whom the United States acquired the property.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the conveyance of certain surplus property of the National Aeronautics and Space Administration located in Erie County, Ohio, to the individuals from whom the United States acquired the property.
